name: fathom

description: Search Fathom meetings, recordings, and team members

tools.name: list-meetings
tools.title: List Meetings
tools.description: Search and list Fathom meetings with full-text search across titles, summaries, and transcripts, plus filters for participants, date ranges, topics, and meeting types

tools.name: get-meeting-details
tools.title: Get Meeting Details
tools.description: Retrieve detailed information about a specific Fathom meeting including summary, transcript, action items, participants, and duration

tools.name: list-team-members
tools.title: List Team Members
tools.description: List Fathom team members with their names, emails, and team affiliations

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
